txt.en: 'Ah yes, you wish to continue on in gaining reputation with the Lossoth of Forochel. Well I can be of assistance. I can give you enough Reputation to be considered an Acquaintance of the Lossoth, if you so wish.'
'Alright, soon the Lossoth of Forochel will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of the Lossoth of Forochel.
